page.title: 04Springfield Life Styles
page.content: {Springfield fashion}is mostly zipped jeans and sweaters for children up to five years old. The zipped jeans are popular for all ages. Safari shorts are popular in the summer with T-shirts with writing on the front and a plain back. Jelly shoes are popular as well as soft ankle boots. The soft ankle boots are just like plimsoles. They have soft soles. Ankle socks are popular as well as fishnet tights. Odd fluorescent socks are popular for boys over five years of age. Cotton mini skirts are popular with striped T_shirts. Peddle pushers are sometimes seen worn by girls but not so often. Adults wear jeans,cords and sweaters like children. They wear nearly the same style of clothes as children.
